channel.title: Discovery Church Orlando FL Video Podcast
channel.description: In an effort to help people strengthen their journey with Christ, David Loveless and the weekend teaching team unpack Bible truth in a way that impact real daily living.
channel.itunes:author: David Loveless
channel.itunes:summary: In an effort to help people strengthen their journey with Christ, David Loveless and the weekend teaching team unpack Bible truth in a way that impact real daily living.

item.title: Overcome - Easter Service
item.itunes:author: Lead Pastor David Loveless
item.itunes:subtitle: In the midst of a world awash with fear, loss, regret, and pain, we find our hearts full of gratitude and joy. How can this be? It defies logic and reason. Living in defeat isn't really living. Come discover what it means to overcome.
item.itunes:keywords: david, loveless, discovery, church, orlando, fl

item.title: Things Could Be Worse: Part 1
item.itunes:author: Lead Pastor David Loveless
item.itunes:subtitle: Just because you fall in the water, doesn't mean you have to drown. Discover how several Biblical heroes learned to overcome adversity.
item.itunes:keywords: david, loveless, discovery, church, orlando, fl
